EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-Email-EC Invitations-T001XI.Invite Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Meet us at Enterprise Connect
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Enterprise Connect 2018 Have you booked your one-on-one meeting with our Nokia experts for Enterprise Connect? Here are some reasons you should make time to visit us at booth #207:
With Nokia’s cloud-native SBC, we are helping our clients achieve success by:
- Deploying new and innovative IP communication services - Protecting themselves against DDoS attacks - Transitioning from legacy UC or SBC infrastructure to the cloud
The immediate and sustained benefits our clients have reported include:
- Improved ROI - Greater protection from untrusted devices - Increased customer satisfaction through new services via WebRTC
So what are you waiting for? You could solve many of your current issues with our award-winning software. Book a meeting <[[https://pages.nokia.com/T001XL-EC-Invitation.html]]> with us and find out how we can work together to hit new benchmarks and increase what success can be at your company. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
